headline: Rental Cars, Cashless Tolls: Convenience Might Cost You
abstract: Rental car companies increasingly offer transponders for cashless tolls, but in some cases, travelers end up paying more than they need to.
lead_paragraph: No one wants hassles on vacation, so this fall my wife and I accepted the offer of a rental car agent in San Francisco who suggested there was a fast, easy way to pay any tolls we might encounter.
